body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
spack install gpgme

```console
$ spack install gpgme 


```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Darwin watchers-MacBook-Pro.local 18.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 18.7.0: Thu Jun 20 18:42:21 PDT 2019; root:xnu-4903.270.47~4/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
``` 
### Additional information

Sometimes the issue benefits from additional details. In these cases there are
a few things we can suggest doing. First of all, you can post the full output of:
```console
$ spack spec --install-status gpgme

--------------------------------

--------------------------------
```
